title: SMNTY Builds a Community
itunes:title: SMNTY Builds a Community
description:
Women-run communes hold a certain appeal for a lot of us for many reasons. We uncover the history of women led and women-only communities, and pontificate about what our own ideal community would look like.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
